{{Infobox Berry |name = #61 Ganlon |image = [[File:Ganlon.png]] |caption = This Berry is surrounded by mystery. It is rumored to be imbued with the power of the land. |growtime = 2d 0h 0m 0s |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |points = 10,000 |flavor =
*0 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *30 bitter *0 sour }} '''Ganlon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 ripe [[Shuca]] on the field. #383 Groudon must have been caught to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-21600s || 21600-43200s || 43200-86400s || 86400-172800s || 172800-345600s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:GanlonTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:GanlonTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:GanlonTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Ganlon berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Shuca]] |- | [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] |- | [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] |- | || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] || [[Shuca]] |}
